humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscriptions from the " pan ", the sound of " divide ", which is the same as the small seal. It means a vessel for holding things or washing, usually round, with a small mouth and a deeper bottom than the plate.

Bronze inscription is used as the original meaning, Huang Dazi Bai Kepen: "Huang Dazi Bai Kezha (made) its 𩞑pen". "𩞑pen" is the edible bowl. The third chapter of "Jijiu Pian": "Changshou, basin, and ang." An ancient note by Yan Shi: "Fou, basin, and ang are ears. The fou is the ang, the big belly and the mouth; the basin is the bottom and wide. "Dialects" Volume 5: "Fang and 甈 are called Ang, and from Guan to the west, it is called the basin, or called the Ang."

"Shuowen": "Pen, Ang Ye. From the bowl, divide the sound."
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscriptions and small seals have the sound of " dish " and " divided ", which means a vessel for holding things or washing. The original meaning is basin.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「皿」，「分」聲，與小篆構形相同，表示盛東西或洗濯用的器皿，通常為圓形，口大底小，比盤深。

　　金文用作本義，黃大子白克盆：「黃大子白克乍(作)其𩞑盆」。「𩞑盆」即食用之盆。《急就篇》第三章：「甀缶盆盎甕罃壺」顏師古注：「缶、盆、盎一類耳。缶即盎也，大腹而歛口；盆則歛底而寬上。」《方言》卷五：「罃、甈謂之盎，自關而西或謂之盆，或謂之盎。」

　　《說文》：「盆，盎也。从皿，分聲。」
humanum_short_description: 金文、小篆從「皿」，「分」聲，表示盛東西或洗濯用的器皿，本義是盆子。

盆字的基本解释

盆
pén
盛放东西或洗涤的用具：盆景。盆花。盆栽。脸盆。澡盆。
中央凹入像盆状的东西：盆地。骨盆。

盆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pén］
［《廣韻》蒲奔切，平魂，並。］
(1)一种较浅的口大底小的盛器，多为圆形。
(2)古炊器。
(3)古量器名。容量为古制十二斗八升。故亦用为容量单位。
(4)浸淹。参见“盆手”。
(5)同“湓”。参见“盆溢”。
(6)姓。汉有中郎将盆谧。见《姓氏书辩证》卷七。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pén］
["Guang Yun" Pu Benqie, Ping Hun, and. ]
(1) A container with a shallow mouth and a small bottom, mostly round.
(2) Ancient cooking utensils.
(3) The name of the ancient measuring instrument. The capacity is 12 buckets and 8 liters. Therefore, it is also used as a capacity unit.
(4) Immersion. See "Pan Hand".
(5) Same as "湓". See "Pan Overflow".
(6) Last name. In the Han Dynasty, there was a middle man named Pen Mi. See Volume Seven of "Dialectics of the Book of Surnames".
